page.title: 07Entertainment in Banbury
page.content: As well as sport for leisure and entertainment in Banbury there is a cinema on Horsefair with various types of films you can watch. There are two Classics (one on the ground floor and one above. Along Marlborough Road there is a library in which there are books for all ages. There are two floors. In the top one you can read quietly. In the bottom one you can choose books. There is a youth club for young people to go and enjoy themselves at Wood Green and one at the Baptist Church on Fridays. There are lots of cubs, scouts, brownies and guide packs too. At Spiceball there is The Mill, where they have plays and singers or groups. Also there are concerts at St. Mary's and plays or musicals at the big schools for the public.
